name: Blackjack
description: Also named "21". The goal of the game is to have cards that add up to points lower than or equal to 21, but higher than the dealer.
rules:
Blackjack is a popular card game typically played between players and a dealer.
The goal is to have a hand value closer to 21 than the dealer's hand without exceeding 21.

Card Values

  • Number cards (2-10): Face value.
  • Face cards (Jack, Queen, King): Worth 10 points.
  • Ace: Can be worth 1 or 11 points, whichever benefits the hand more.

Gameplay

  1. Initial Deal: Each player and the dealer receive two cards. Players’ cards are face up; the dealer has one card face up and one face down.

  2. Player Options:
    • Hit: Take another card.
    • Stand: Keep your current hand.

  3. Dealer's Turn: The dealer reveals their face-down card and must hit until their hand totals 17 or more.

  4. Winning:
    • If your hand exceeds 21, you bust and lose.
    • If the dealer busts and you don’t, you win.
    • If your hand is closer to 21 than the dealer’s without busting, you win.
    • If your hand is exactly 21, you get a "Blackjack", and you win.
